summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4237 for the improvement of Alaska Street, from 50th Avenue South to Lake Washington Boulevard; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50342, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
